title: [CMV] 話人自私是自私的行為

replies.msg:
自私的定義是不顧別人；將自身的利益或愉悅放在別人的利益或愉悅之上。

話人自私是將他人負面標籤，不鼓勵他做特定行為。這其實是把自己的看法凌駕於他人自身的道德審判上。此舉正正是不顧別人的想法，是自私的行為。


The definition of ‘selfish’ is lacking consideration for other people; concerned chiefly one’s own personal profit or pleasure. (OED)

Calling someone selfish is applying a negative label to an individual to discourage one’s behaviour. This overrides the subject’s own moral judgement with one’s own view of the world. And this very act lacks the consideration for other people, therefore it is selfish.

CMV

想係連登試吓reddit嘅change my view。
